channel.title: Hmm Any1?
channel.description:
My Server is up and running..Everything Is good
however when I go to log into my client.
I put in server:"2"
It usually works however it says cant connect then gets server status..
and on the server status gets
Server status 1: offline Server status 2: online
So I put in server 1 and still offline, So can anybody explain whats wrong?

item.title: Hmm Any1?
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Meth Sir Meth
item.description:
@Sir_Meth wrote:

bme:

Hes using T X’s basic server 2. Change the port from 43594 to port 43595 (switch the line with the port number ending in 4 with the line that has the 5) in I believe mudclient. That should set it to world 1 instead of world 2. This will also solve another problem down the road - f2p only on world 2 but p2p on world 1. (Sharks are members items on world 2)

Dont Expect you know what ur talking about,
No Im not using T x’s Basic server.
So GTFO

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm Any1?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hes using T X’s basic server 2. Change the port from 43594 to port 43595 (switch the line with the port number ending in 4 with the line that has the 5) in I believe mudclient. That should set it to world 1 instead of world 2. This will also solve another problem down the road - f2p only on world 2 but p2p on world 1. (Sharks are members items on world 2)

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm Any1?
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Meth Sir Meth
item.description:
@Sir_Meth wrote:

Thanks For the help

I guess ill get on it.

Maybe Make a Tut or something on it, If more people ask about it

Anyways Thanks

item.title: Hmm Any1?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

I’m the only one so far that has had this problem before. Search for google INSIDE mudclient.java. You have to change the return values. If that doesn’t work then your problem was different than mine. Make sure the web server and mysql etc are all running and functioning properly.

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm Any1?
item.dc:creator: @Sir_Meth Sir Meth
item.description:
@Sir_Meth wrote:

First Off, I didnt Explain it quite well. I read what i wrote to myself And I was confused,
So sorry Elayd and Kyle

I believe Bigh51 is on the right track.

Here im posting a Picture now…

I have used Google and havent found anything,

I guess my google magic isnt good enough

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm Any1?
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

Erm, Im guessing the simplest problem here, All u need to do is click the the 1, press ‘‘delete’’ or your keyboard then hit then press number ‘‘2’’ or your keyboard & the click login/ok? and you should be able 2 login? :S That explains why when u try and login to server 1 it says offline & server 2 = online, Pretty self explanatory tbh :S

Read full topic

item.title: Hmm Any1?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“Sir Meth, post:1, topic:233574”]My Server is up and running…Everything Is good

however when I go to log into my client.

I put in server:“2”

It usually works however it says cant connect then gets server status…

and on the server status gets

Server status 1: offline
Server status 2: online

So I put in server 1 and still offline, So can anybody explain whats wrong?[/quote]It’s in mudclient.java, and it’s something to do with the word “google”. I’m not going to help you with how to fix it though. I’ll give you a hint: It has to do with returning value’s.

Read full topic
